body:
`/all.bash` runs `go test runtime -short`, it is likely that the full tests suite will not pass on the rpi in under 10 minutes.

Please consult, http://dave.cheney.net/2015/09/04/building-go-1-5-on-the-raspberry-pi. I'm going to close this now, please reopen it if you have further questions, or feel free to take this to the golang-nuts mailing list.
